attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned call upon the Government to abolish music licences that are required for Micro Businesses that play music in the background.

Exclusions to this partition would be :
Businesses that could not function without playing music.
Businesses that are conected with the music or entertainment businesses.
Businesses that use music as a tool for timing of rythm.
Businesses that have more than 10 customers at a time.

Micro businesses have enough taxes to deal with and as long as music is not part of their business and they are not profiting from backgound music,  I see no good reason to pursue them.
